Back on Ruby Road

ruby coding

March 19, 2019

It's been a minute since my last post and also since the last time I wrote Ruby for a living. After a five-month-or-so React Native binge, I'm back on the Rails, and wow, I literally typed const yesterday when defining a variable. By which I mean it's going great, how are you?
